page.title: 14Social Life in Laggan 1985
page.content: There are several clubs & societies organised in Laggan.All these take place in the recently built village.The new modern hall has been erected by public subscription,donations from land owners and grants from the H.I.D.B.The clubs include senior & junior choir, senior and junior youth groups, Scottish Womens Rural Institute, football,badminton and archery club.To find entertainment a journey of 25 miles to Aviemore has to be taken for cinema,bingo,disco and 60 miles to Inverness for a Theatre.Therefore entertainment is home-spun,attending concerts,ceilidhs, dances and clubs.
